hero.title: Nikela umfutho kuKoparetivu yakho
hero.subtitle: Hlolisa Tinhloso tekuSimama
hero.description: Kulula, kuphephile, futhi kunemthelelaâ€”sita ikoparetivu yakho kutsi icwale esikhatsini sedijithali kantsi yakha tindlela tesimama tetemnotfo.

items.title: Kuhlolwa kwekuSimama
items.description: Hlela tindlela temvelo, tenhlalakahle, kanye nekuphatsa kutsi wakhe ikoparetivu lesimeme nekutetsembela kakhulu.

items.title: Tihlelo temsebenti
items.description: Landzelela inchubekela yakho ngetibhodi teKanban letisebentako, kuguqula tinchazelo tekulungisa kube yimisebenti lephatswako kanye netintfo letitfolakalako.

items.title: Yakhelwe tikoparetivu
items.description: Yenzelwe ngokukhethekile tinhlangano tekoparetivu eNingizimu Afrika

items.title: Kusekela tilwimi letinyenti
items.description: Kuyatfolakala ngeSingisi, siSwati, siPutukezi, siZulu, siJalimani, kanye nesiFulentshi

items.title: Kusebenta ngaphandle kwe-intanethi
items.description: Kusebenta ngendlela letetsembekile noma kuncane kakhulu lokuxhumana ne-intanethi

adminDashboard.intro: Phatsa indawo yekuhlola ye-DGRV futhi usekele tikoparetivu kulo lonkhe laseNingizimu Afrika.
adminDashboard.manageOrganizationsDesc: Ngezelela, hlela, futhi phatsa tinhlangano tekoparetivu kulesistimu.
adminDashboard.manageUsersDesc: Lawula kungenela kwebasebenti kanye netindima kuto tonkhe tinhlangano.
adminDashboard.manageQuestionsDesc: Yakha futhi hlela imibuto ngaphakathi kwesigaba sekulungisa.
adminDashboard.reviewAssessmentsDesc: Buketa kuhlolwa lokutfunyelwe futhi unikele tincomo.
adminDashboard.standardRecommendationsDesc: Phatsa tincomo letingasetjentiswa kabusha tetimo tekulungisa letivamile.
adminDashboard.guideIntro: Siyakwemukela etikwatini temphatsi ye-DGRV! Nati timphawu letitsite letingakusita kuphatsa indawo:
adminDashboard.guideOrgsUsers: Sebentisa tigatja tekuPhatsa tinhlangano kanye nekuPhatsa basebenti kutsi ulawule kungenela kanye nebumenyi.
adminDashboard.guideReview: Buketa futhi uvumele kuhlolwa esigatjeni sekubuketa kuhlolwa.
adminDashboard.guideCategoriesQuestions: Lungisa tigaba nemibuto kutsi ulungiselele inchubo yekulungisa kute tifuneko takho.
adminDashboard.guideDocs: Kute tincijileko letinemininingwane, vakashela tincijileko temphatsi.

standardRecommendations.title: Tincomo letivamile
standardRecommendations.manageDesc: Phatsa tincomo letingasetjentiswa kabusha tekubuketiwa kwekuhlolwa
standardRecommendations.emptyDesc: Yakha tincomo letingasetjentiswa kabusha kutsi usheshise kubuketiwa kwekuhlolwa.
standardRecommendations.confirmDelete: Ucinisekile yini kutsi ufuna kucisha letincomo letivamile?

welcome.title: Siyakwemukela, Mphatsi! Shukumisa umthelela wekoparetivu!
welcome.description: Phatsa indawo yekuhlola ye-DGRV futhi usekele tikoparetivu kulo lonkhe laseNingizimu Afrika.
